Name: Silver Bronx
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Bronx made 'silver' by the addition of egg white.
Nutrition: One serving of Silver Bronx contains 164 calories
